messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J1(4.9)}I was shocked to realize{~N}the talisman of Metraton{~N}was being used.
{~J1(4.0)}In spite of the lost soul{~N}returning at last,
{~J1(4.3)}Just a little longer and all{~N}would have been for naught.
{~J1(7.0)}It's all because of that man.{~N}We must be thankful to him.
{~J1(8.5)}his little girl still has to go.{~N}What a pity...{~E}
{~J1(5.6)}Well, well, well.{~N}To think you'd make it this far.
{~J1(2.5)}Where's Cheryl!?{~N}What have you done to her!?
{~J1(4.8)}You've seen her many times.{~N}Restored to her former self.
{~J1(4.5)}You are the only one{~N}who thinks so.
{~J1(4.4)}For the seven years{~N}since that terrible day,
{~J1(6.5)}Alessa has been trapped{~N}in an endless nightmare{~N}from which she never wakens.
{~J1(5.1)}Everyone will be released,{~N}from pain and suffering.
{~J1(4.7)}When all our sorrows{~N}will be washed away.
{~J0(6.2)}My daughter will be{~N}the mother of God!{~E}
{~J1(4.7)}Your role is over.{~N}We don't need you anymore.
{~J1(3.6)}What do you think you can{~N}accomplish by coming here?
{~J1(3.2)}Bet you can't see this{~N}and keep your cool.{~E}
{~J0(3.5)}Aglaophotis!{~N}I thought I got rid of that!
{~J0(3.2)}All I had to do was plant it{~N}somewhere for you to find,
{~J2(4.9)}Descended among us to reach out{~N}and save us!{~E}
